effect.shortEffect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.
effect.full: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

description.x-y: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.
description.sun-moon: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
description.sword-shield: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
